GK17kvrtrsuu:1497: aparaṃ lavalyāṃ sarvamapi prāktanaṃ prastutaṃ pūrvavaditi bhavati / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1513: piṃgalanāgastu padacaturūrdhvādiṣu prathamapādaviparyāse sati maṃjaryādi nāmāni vīkṣyati // 5 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1517: tryaṅdhrigatabhanajalā gayutā sajasā jagau caraṇamekata paṭhet // KVrk_5.6 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1518: prathamapāde sagaṇajagaṇasagaṇā laghuśca tathā dvitīyapāde nagaṇasagaṇajagaṇaguravo
GK17kvrtrsuu:1520: caturthe caraṇe sagaṇajagaṇasagaṇā jagaṇo guruśca yatra sā udgatā nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1524: vīkṣya sapadi yuvatiṃ vikṛtiṃ niyataṃ prayāti vipulodgatāstanuḥ // 6 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1526: rnau bhagau bhavati saurabhakaṃ caraṇe yadīha bhavatastṛtīyake // KVrk_5.7 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1527: yadyudgatāyāstṛtīye pāde ragaṇanagaṇabhagaṇaguravo bhavanti tadā saurabhakaṃ nāma vṛttaṃ bhavet / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1530: nayugaṃ sakārayugalaṃ ca bhavati caraṇe tṛtīyake /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1531: taduditamurumatibhirlalitaṃ yadi śeṣamasya khalu pūrvatulyakam // KVrk_5.8 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1532: yadyudgatāyāstṛtīye caraṇe dvau nagaṇau dvau sagaṇau ca bhavataḥ tadā lalitaṃ nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1535: iyamatinayati mudā pramattā purato vayasya tava lāsyamuttamam // 8 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1542: yasya prathame pāde magaṇasagaṇajagaṇabhagaṇā dvau gurū ekataḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1544: dvitīye pāde sagaṇanagaṇajagaṇaragaṇā guruśca tathā tṛtīye pāde dvau nagaṇau sagaṇaścaturthe
GK17kvrtrsuu:1545: nagaṇatrayaṃ jagaṇayagaṇau ca tadvṛttaṃ upasthitapūrvaṃ upasthitapracupitamityarthaḥ / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1548: nau pāde 'tha tṛtīyake sanau nasayuktau prathamāṅdhrikṛtayatistu vardhamānam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1549: tritayamaparamapi pūrvasadṛśamiha bhavati pratatamatibhiriti gaditaṃ khalu vṛttam // KVrk_5.10 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1550: tadeva padacaturūrdhvaṃ tṛtīye pāde nagaṇau sagaṇanagaṇau ca bhavataḥ prathamasya
GK17kvrtrsuu:1551: caturūrdhvasyāṅdhiḥ prathamāṅdhrivat kṛtā yatiryasya kriyāviśeṣaṇasya tatprathamāṅdhrikṛtayatiryathā bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1552: evamaparapādatrayaṃ pūrvasadṛśamiha tantre tadvṛttaṃ ācāryairvardhamānaṃ nāmoktam / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1555: asminneva tṛtīyake pāde tajarā syuḥ prathame ca viratirārṣabhaṃ bruvanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1556: tacchuddhavirāṭpuraḥ sthitaṃ tritayamaparamapi yadi pūrvasamaṃ syāt // KVrk_5.11 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1557: asminneva padacaturūrdhvavṛtte tṛtīye pāde tagaṇajagaṇaragaṇā bhaveyuḥ,
GK17kvrtrsuu:1558: aparaṃ pādatrayamapi pūrvasamaṃ bhavati tadā śuddhavirāṭpuraḥsthitaṃ ārṣabhaṃ vadanti śuddhavirāḍārṣabhamityarthaḥ / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1563: yacchaṃdo noktamatra gātheti tatsūribhiḥ proktam // KVrk_5.12 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1564: viṣamākṣarāṇi yeṣu te pādā yasmin viṣamākṣarapādaṃ yadevameva aṣṭau daśasaptanavākṣaraṃ vā sarvapādairasamaṃ tripādaṃ ṣaṭpādaṃ vā daśadharmavat / yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1565: daśa dharmaṃ na jānanti dhṛtirāṣṭra nibodha tān /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1567: tvaramāṇaśa bhīruśca lubdhaḥ kāmī ca te daśaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1569: ityevamādi asmin cchaṃdasyarthe noktaṃ prayogeṣu dṛśyate tadgātheti vidvadbhiruktam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1572: iti sulhaṇaviracitāyāṃ sukavihṛdayānandinyabhidhānāyāṃ vṛttaratnākaracchaṃdovṛttau viṣamavṛttādhyāyaḥ paṃcamaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1577: saṃkhyā caivādhvayogaśca ṣaḍete pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // KVrk_6.1 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1580: yathopari tathā śeṣaṃ bhūyaḥ kuryādamuṃ vidhim // KVrk_6.2 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1583: pāde sarvagurau yāvatāṃ varṇānāṃ vṛttasya pādastāvaṃta eva guravo vilikhyante /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1585: caturakṣaracchaṃdasi ādyādguroradhaḥ adhovibhāge laghuṃ varṇaṃ nyasya sthāpayitvā tadanaṃtaraṃ nyastalaghoḥ sakāśāt śeṣebhyo varṇebhyo adhaḥ kiṃ sthāpyata ityāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1587: yadyupari gurustadā adhastādapi gururyadyupari laghustadā adhastādapi laghuḥ śeṣam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1591: laghuṃ nyasya guroradhaḥ yathopari tathā śeṣamiti punarapyamuṃ vidhiṃ kuryāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1592: yadā upari gururbhavati laghuṃ nyasya guroradha iti vidherabhāvādyaḥ pūrvadeśādūne dadyādgurūṇi iti ūnapradeśo gurubhiḥ pūryata ityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1593: evamanena prakāreṇa tāvannyāsaḥ kartavyo yāvatsarvalaghuḥ pado bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1600: naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṃkaḥ tasyārdhe 'rdhe same ca laḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1602: prastāradarśitānāṃ vṛttānāṃ madhye yadvṛttaṃ naṣṭaṃ luptaṃ bhavati tasya naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṃka ekādisaṃkhyā tasya ardhe 'rdhe same ca aṃke sati lo laghurbhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1603: viṣame ekaṃ ādhāya prakṣipya tasyārdhe 'rdhe gururbhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1605: tasya aṃkaḥ paṃca sa ca ardhaṃ na prayacchati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1609: tadardhe guruḥ prāpyate punastrayo 'rdhaṃ na prayacchanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1612: tadardhe laghuḥ prāpyate punareko 'rdhaṃ na prayacchati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1616: ādyau dvau gurū tābhyāṃ parako laghustato gururiti / '; '; /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1621: laghusthā ye tu tatrāṃkāstaiḥ saikairmiśritairbhavet // KVrk_6.5 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1622: kenacittadvṛttaṃ prastāryakatamat iti saṃkhyāparijñānā uktaṃ taduddiṣṭamucyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1625: atra punarvṛttaṃ jñāyate saṃkhyā na jñāyate ataḥ saṃkhyāparijñānārthaṃ uddiṣṭamidamucyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1626: tasya uddiṣṭavṛttasya prathamādakṣarādārabhya upari dviguṇānaṃkān samālikhet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1628: asminneva caturākṣare chaṃdasi ekaṃ vṛttaṃ uddiṣṭaṃ tasya dvau varṇau gurū tato laghustato 'pi guruḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1629: tatra uddiṣṭe vṛtte laghuni tiṣṭhantīti laghusthā ye punaraṃkāścatvāraḥ taiścaturbhiḥ saikaiḥ ekena sahitaiḥ paṃcabhiruddiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1638: yāvaṃta eva vṛttabhavā varṇā tāvata eva saikān ekasahitānyathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1639: caturakṣarajātau catvāro ye varṇāstān saikān paṃca /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1640: auttarādharyataḥsthitān uparyuparibhāvena sthitān ekādikrameṇaiva etānupari upari nikṣipet nidadhyāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1643: evamanena prakāreṇa kasmādiyaṃ ekadvyādilagukriyāṃ pravartata ityāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1649: 'pāde sarvagurāvādyāllaghuṃ nyasye'ti tena tasmāt adha iyaṃ ekadvyādilagukriyā pravartate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1650: tatra paṃcasu varṇeṣu uttarādharabhāvena sthāpiteṣu adhaḥsthita ekastaduparisthe nikṣipyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1651: sa ca tathaiva tiṣṭhati tyajannekaikamūrdhvata iti vīpsavaśādekadaiva sthitimaṃtareṇa
GK17kvrtrsuu:1652: nikṣiptatvāt punarnikṣepabhāvādekaikatyāgaśca na saṃbhavati tasmātsvarūpeṇa sthita
GK17kvrtrsuu:1654: tato dvitīye sthāne dvau varṇau bhavataḥ tau tṛtīyena kṣipyeta tatra trayo bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1655: tacca caturthe nikṣipyante te catvāro bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1656: 'upāntyato nivartate tyajannekaikamūrdhvataḥ' uparitanamekaṃ tyajyate tatra na kṣipyate ityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1657: vīpsā ta eva adhobhāgāt punarnikṣepe kriyā pravartate tena adhaḥsthita eva eko dvitīye sthāne nikṣipyate tatra ca trayo bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1658: tacca tṛtīye nikṣipyante tatra ṣaṭbhavanti upari ekaṃ tyajannivarteta /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1659: ādyaṃ ekaṃ vṛttaṃ sarvaguruḥ tasmāddekadvyādilagukriyā pravartete /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1660: tata ekaḥ sarvaguruḥ catvāri dvilaghūni ṣaṭtrilaghūni catvāri caturlaghūni ekaṃ sarvalaghuḥ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1661: eṣā lagukriyā sarvalaghuprastāreṇa pratīyate asyāstu eṣa eva kramaḥ paṃcākṣarādivṛtteṣvapi // 6-7 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1667: lagukriyāyāṃ ye aṃkāsteṣāṃ sandohastasminvimiśrite pīḍīkṛte saṃkhyā bhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1669: tathā ekaścatvāraḥ ṣaṭcatvāraḥ ekameṣāmekīkṛtā vai ṣoḍaśa bhavanti caturakṣarajātau prastāryamāṇāyāṃ ṣoḍaśa vṛttāni bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1672: uddiṣṭasya vṛttasya upari ye aṃkā dviguṇāsteṣāṃ samāhāraḥ ekībhāvaḥ saiko vā athavā janayedutpādayedimāṃ saṃkhyām /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1674: caturakṣarajātau dviguṇā ye aṃkā uparyāropitāsteṣāṃ samāhāraḥ paṃcadaśa saikaḥ ṣoḍaśeti // 8 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1679: caturakṣarajātau yā ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā syāddviguṇā dvātriṃśatiḥ ekonā ekarahitā ekatriṃśatiḥ sadbhiḥ paṇḍitairadhvā mārgaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1682: adhunā punarapi kaviranvayapūrvakaṃ pitrā saha sātmānaṃ nirddiśati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1687: vaṃśe 'nvaye 'bhūjjātaḥ kaśyapasya kaśyaṃ somaṃ pibatīti kaśyapaḥ kaśyapaśabdena yadyapi surā evābhidhīyate kathyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1688: tathāpyatra somamucyate surāpānasya brāhmaṇe dije niṣiddhatvāt anvayārthena vaṃśārthena kranuyāyitvamuktaṃ syāt (?) /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1689: śivasya ete śaivā ye siddhāntāsteṣāṃ vettā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1693: yo hi vicārayati cintayati so avaśyaṃ vetti nahyaviditaṃ vicārayituṃ śaknoti viśeṣeṇa
GK17kvrtrsuu:1694: pratipūrayati svargāpavargādikāni sa vipraḥ vimalataramatiḥ vimalā vistīrṇā taralā
GK17kvrtrsuu:1698: kedāranāmā tasya putraḥ śivaḥ śānto devatāviśeṣaḥ tasyārādhanaṃ tatra ekāgraṃ tanniṣṭhaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1699: tathā tena kedāreṇābhirāmaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ manoharaṃ chaṃdaḥ prakarṣeṇa viracitaṃ vṛttaratnākarākhyām // 10-11 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1700: iti paṃḍitaśrīsulhaṇaviracitāyāṃ sukavihṛdayānandinyabhidhānāyāṃ chaṃdovṛttau ṣaṭpratyayādhyāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ samāptaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1703: vasuyugme ....... śuklaśca paṃcamyāṃ haṃsarājena muninā 'likhaṭṭīkā manoramā //
